channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- macOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- macOS

item.title: CVE-2023-23513|2024-08-01T17:34:20.228Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in macOS Big Sur 11.7.3, macOS Ventura 13.2, macOS Monterey 12.6.3. Mounting a maliciously crafted Samba network share may lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-40781|2024-08-01T13:56:25.888Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-40802|2024-08-01T13:55:47.107Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-40828|2024-08-01T13:55:07.956Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A malicious app may be able to gain root privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-27878|2024-08-01T13:54:08.589Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6. An app with root privileges may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-27844|2024-07-31T20:01:14.339Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.2, macOS Sonoma 14.5, Safari 17.5. A website's permission dialog may persist after navigation away from the site.

item.title: CVE-2024-27877|2024-07-31T20:10:45.609Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to a denial-of-service or potentially disclose memory contents.

item.title: CVE-2024-27853|2024-07-31T16:32:34.768Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.4. A maliciously crafted ZIP archive may bypass Gatekeeper checks.

item.title: CVE-2024-40803|2024-07-31T13:17:40.349Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. An attacker may be able to cause unexpected app termination.

item.title: CVE-2024-40783|2024-07-30T19:29:23.452Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved restriction of data container access. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A malicious application may be able to bypass Privacy preferences.

item.title: CVE-2024-40814|2024-07-30T19:27:26.489Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: A downgrade issue was addressed with additional code-signing restrictions. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6. An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences.

item.title: CVE-2024-40781|2024-07-30T19:39:58.095Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.

item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-27888|2024-07-30T17:51:06.676Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: A permissions issue was addressed by removing vulnerable code and adding additional checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.4. An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-40832|2024-07-30T15:17:40.877Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6. An app may be able to view a contact's phone number in system logs.

item.title: CVE-2023-42959|2024-07-30T15:29:07.881Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14. An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-40816|2024-07-30T15:22:16.892Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A local attacker may be able to cause unexpected system shutdown.

item.title: CVE-2024-27886|2024-07-30T15:26:43.251Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.4. An unprivileged app may be able to log keystrokes in other apps including those using secure input mode.

item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6. A malicious application may be able to access private information.

item.description: The issue was addressed with improved restriction of data container access. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A malicious application may be able to bypass Privacy preferences.

item.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.4. A maliciously crafted ZIP archive may bypass Gatekeeper checks.

item.description: A downgrade issue was addressed with additional code-signing restrictions. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6. An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences.

item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.

item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6, macOS Monterey 12.7.6, macOS Ventura 13.6.8. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-27862|2024-08-01T14:12:05.896Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.6. Enabling Lockdown Mode while setting up a Mac may cause FileVault to become unexpectedly disabled.

item.title: CVE-2023-42913|2024-08-01T14:17:38.463Z -- apple -- macos
item.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.2. Remote Login sessions may be able to obtain full disk access permissions.
